01

Philippe Starck

Task: Create a portfolio style website featuring a prominent furniture designer. old.

Solution: Being that Starck is a user focused designer, I chose to a simple and elegant design that was easy to navigate yet stylish.

See Website

02

Space X Timeline

Task: Create a timeline featuring Space X while using similar styling to the company. old.

Solution: In the style of Space X, I chose large full window photographs and use a parallax scroll in order to maintain a highly visual and modern astetic.

See Website

03

Card title

Task: Create a childrens website targeting ages ranging from 8-11 years old.

Solution: A space exploration website based on the SpaceX program. The site includes a dark theme with gradient color pops, animations, highly interactive javacript game and informative videos

See Website
